summary:
Are tired of all those standard-race-followers? Have you ever thought "Man,I wish one of these mannequins would wear my armor AND do my work in battle, but I´m too lazy to mod it myself"?
Then this mod is for you!
descriptionHtml:
~~~~~What did you do this time?~~~~ 
Are tired of all those standard-race-followers? Have you ever thought "Man,I wish one of these mannequins would wear my armor AND do my work in battle, but I´m too lazy to mod it myself"? 
[b]Then this mod is for you![/b] 

~~~~~~~~~~~[b]Where is he?[/b]~~~~~~~~~~~
[b]Before he quit his job as mannequin, he stood on a pedestal in the Jarl´s chambers in Whiterun. Now he´s just wandering around there. Just look for him there.[/b] 

~~~~[b]What´s so special about him,huh?[/b]~~~~ 
-He´s a mannequin,duh... 
-He has a total of [b]3(!)[/b] spells, [b]2[/b] of which are custom: 
-Oakflesh, because he´s got wood 
-Fire Grenades, basically a larger fireball, that doesn´t defy gravity as much as the standard ones 
-And, as fun extra, Gourd Lobber. I can´t get him to use it, but there´s a spell tome in the room where he was originally. 
-He has gauntlets with a custom enchantment. You can´t get them, but it´s nothing you couldn´t do yourself if you´re a good enchanter. 
-He has ragged trousers, and you don´t see that often on a follower,do you? 
-He will carry your armor [b]AND[/b] your weapons! 
-If you like the sound of bears, [b]he even has a custom dialogue option for that![/b] 
-And he just causes death and destruction 

Update 1.1: 
-[b]He is now marriable![/b] I don´t know why someone said that would be terryfying 

~~~~[b]Probably-about-to-be-asked-Questions (PAQ)[/b]~~~~ 
[i]Where can I find him?[/i] 
- Seriously...? 

[i]Is he marriable?[/i] 
- Maybe in a future update 

[i]That´s awesome![/i] 
- That´s not a question...
author: McBook
